Articles.Content:
Hello

cant upload any images but basically some of the ksp mod parts have more than one textures causing them to constantly overlap each other in a glitchy mess

i tried to ignore them at first but new mods i install are also affected by the glitch.

i double checked my module manager but everything seems to be ok

Seems to only affect Near Future mods

Edited May 25 by Somali_Pirate
